Apollo.name: Apollo
Apollo.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their yours just vacated.

Artemis.name: Artemis
Artemis.description: Your Worker may move one additional time, but no back to its initial space

Athena.name: Athena
Athena.description: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn

Atlas.name: Atlas
Atlas.description: Your Worker may build a dome at any level

Demeter.name: Demeter
Demeter.description: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space

Hephaestus.name: Hephaestus
Hephaestus.description: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block

Minotaur.name: Minotaur
Minotaur.description: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level

Pan.name: Pan
Pan.description: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels

Chronus.name: Chronus
Chronus.description: You also win when there are at least five complete towers on the board

Prometheus.name: Prometheus
Prometheus.description: If your worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving

Limus.name: Limus
Limus.description: Opponent workers cannot build on spaces neighboring your workers, unless building a dome to create a Complete Tower

Zeus.name: Zeus
Zeus.description: Your worker may build a block under itself
